item.title: Create A Chrome Extension Tutorial
item.description: The purpose of this tutorial is to show you how to make a simple Chrome Extension. Throughout this tutorial we will be making a simple extension that when clicked, will show an HTML page with the text “Hello World!”. A Chrome Extension is just some basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that allows you to add some type of functionality to Chrome by using Chrome’s JavaScript APIs. For this tutorial, we are going to focus on building a simple Hello World html page that uses basic JavaScript.
